朋友们 你们帮我测试加载快不快？？？

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content: 我家网络8太好，现在电信差不多半分钟到一分钟左右，周末我回爷爷奶奶家试试看长城宽带吧，反正确实有一点点慢，不过没炸

AkkLive 发表于 2020-6-16 19:22
如果用你的链接图床 不通过咋整？

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
AkkLive 发表于 2020-6-16 19:22
如果用你的链接图床 不通过咋整？
What does TinyPNG do?
TinyPNG uses smart lossy compression techniques to reduce the file size of your PNG files. By selectively decreasing the number of colors in the image, fewer bytes are required to store the data. The effect is nearly invisible but it makes a very large difference in file size!

不是图床，是压缩文件大小方便上传

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: SHEEP_REALMS
replies.txt_content:
十分不推荐超长图，建议切割或压缩。
每个人的网络环境都不一样，不同地区访问同一个的图床也会有不同的速度。
